items.summary: Add a `/install` route to the TanStack Router configuration in `frontend/src/App.tsx` that renders the existing `InstallPage` component from `frontend/src/pages/InstallPage.tsx`.

Add a visible entry point to the `/install` page from within the app — for example, a menu item or button in the TopBar or BottomNav (or an 'Install App' option in a settings/about area) — so users can easily discover and navigate to the install page.
